comment: This class was straight forward. Your grade is composed of quizzes, a group project, and 3 tests. A little bit of advice. Do the quizzes and study them for part of the test. The project consisted of a plant tour and writing a report that details info based on what you learned in the lectures. Pretty easy A as long as you attend class and study.

Hands down favorite teacher I've ever had at Kennesaw! He made coming to class and learning the material enjoyable. You can easily do well on the tests without the book. Tests are multiple choice and essay, but not bad at all. Tests come strait from lectures so go to class. Always let the summer class out early. Take this professor!!!!

Come to class, take notes and you will succeed. Myers prides himself on having students do well, but you have to put in the effort. Took him on Wed. from 8-10:45pm and we were out within an hour. HIGHLY RECOMMEND if you need a business elective.

This guy is the man. I always looked forward to going to class. His test are not the easiest but are doable. test are multiple choice, essay and calculation format. dont skip classes unless you have jesse in your class to take notes and put it on d2l. he let us out of class very early too.

The guy is the man! 3 tests that were straight forward and not very difficult, which are 1/3 multiple choice, 1/3 essay and 1/3 math (gives all formulas). Easy online quizzes and a plant tour paper which was graded fairly easily. Writes notes on board and gives a lot of real world examples from his experience working at Delta. Take him great class!

What I love about this guy is how practical his teaching is. Rather than forcing us to memorize everything in the book, he points out the relevant material and teaches us to actually apply it. He is also a friendly guy. I recommend him!
Professor Myers is a good teacher and covers all the material for the tests. You will need to attend class because you really don't use the book. Take good notes and you will be fine.
Easy class. I had him for a night class and he had us out within 30 minutes. Hes cute and easy to understand. Midterm was take home and group project was easy

Great professor. I am taking him again in the spring for mgt4850.  Come to class since most of the exam comes from lecture notes. But why wouldn't you come to class if you are paying for it? I don't understand some people. Good personality for a night class as well.

BEWARE!I took his online class and he was never involved in the class. Took forever to answer emails, tons of work every week, but now it's finals week and we still haven't received any grades for work we've been doing every single week. 60% of grade is group work.No feedback whatsoever from this guy. Take someone else; his online class is useless

I thought Myers was great.  He did try to keep it interesting to students but we were in an evening class so people were ready to go home.  Definitely take him though.  He will help you with anything and just know your notes and you'll do fine!  Be prepared for the first test or else you'll be trying hard to pull up your grade in the end.

Great prof.  His test are a bit hard but all the material you need is in the notes. One of the best professors in the business school.  You will almost never stay the whole hour and fifteen.  I definately recommend taking him!

great and funny guy but very confusing at times. always checks his sports scores during class a ton of times (tech fan). no need to buy the text book, hardly ever used it. just take good notes. let's out early if done early.

Bob Myers is a good teacher, but he did not work for me.  I found his lectures very unorganized and I could not follow his teaching style. He loves football, but he could use some help planning his lectures.  Other than that... He is great on the eyes...

Class isn't hard, but you do need to study. Multiple choice can be tricky, but math and essay questions are straight forward. Test are mostly from his notes, but it definitely helps to read the text. No surprises! Group project is not hard, choose wisely! Prof. Myers is a fun, and easy on the eyes!

Great teacher.  You have to study for his tests but he gives you all the information you need to know.  You need to take good notes in class.  Gives you some case studies and a group project but these aren't bad at all.

Great professor! Tests are not exactly easy, but everyone seems to do well on them because he teaches the material in an easy to understand manner.    Great teaching style, doesn't beat around the bush and gets straight to the point instead of lecturing on and on like some of the egotistical teachers here at KSU.  Get in this class, guaranteed A!!

bob is awesome! he lets you call him bob. you can even pick on him. bob is not easy, but if you study whatever it is he says will be on the test and check out the chapters, you'll definitely be prepared for the tests. i'd take him again!
best teacher at kennesaw!!
GREAT teacher, great guy and very funny. He reminds me a lot of Adam Sandler. His class is never boring and easy. His tests aren't too hard either.
He is a awesome teacher.One of the best.Willing to help you and clarify things.Tests are not bad, just study, has alot of lists(you'll see).Won't make them to hard.Also he is very HOT

Bob makes class fun and interesting. He give 2 extra credit oppotunities, which are worth a total of 50 points. Those points can make the difference between a B and an A. I highly recommend him. He is also very good looking:)
He teaches concepts, not vocabulary. He explains things well and answers questions. Come to class and do the homework and you'll do fine. I had a very easy time getting an A in his class.

Teaches from text concept. Doesn't appear to have good understanding of the business world from a management perspective. It's apparent he has never held a position of responsibility within an operation. Exams-not too difficult, come to class, easy A.
